title: Among Us
description: An online and local party game of teamwork and betrayal for 4-15 players...in space!

title: Persona 5 Royal
description: Don the mask and join the Phantom Thieves of Hearts as they stage grand heists, infiltrate the minds of the corrupt, and make them change their ways!

title: Minecraft (PC)
description: Dive into an open world of building, crafting and survival in the ultimate sandbox builder. Gather resources, survive the night, and build an epic adventure one block at a time. Explore and craft your way through a completely open world where you can play with friends, build a block city, start a farm, mine deep into the ground, face mysterious enemies, or just experiment to the limits of your imagination!

title: Terraria
description: Dive into an open world of building, crafting and survival in the ultimate sandbox builder. Gather resources, survive the night, and build an epic adventure one block at a time. Explore and craft your way through a completely open world where you can play with friends, build a block city, start a farm, mine deep into the ground, face mysterious enemies, or just experiment to the limits of your imagination!

title: Skyrim (PC)
description: Winner of more than 200 Game of the Year Awards, The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edition brings the epic fantasy to life in stunning detail. The Special Edition includes the critically acclaimed game and add-ons with all-new features.

title: Acer Aspire 5
description: A slim and lightweight laptop with a Ryzen 5 processor suitable for school and work.

title: ASUS VivoBook 16X
description: A 16-inch productivity laptop with a powerful Ryzen 7 CPU for multitasking.

title: Lenovo IdeaPad Gaming 3
description: A gaming laptop equipped with RTX graphics and fast refresh rate display.

title: HP Pavilion 14
description: A compact 14-inch laptop designed for everyday use and long battery life.

title: MSI Katana GF66
description: A performance gaming laptop with Intel Core i7 and high refresh rate display.

title: Intel Core i5-12400F
description: A 6-core 12th gen processor ideal for gaming and general builds.

title: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060
description: A mid-range GPU offering great performance and DLSS 3 support.

title: Kingston Fury Beast 16GB DDR4
description: A reliable 3200MHz DDR4 RAM stick for smooth performance.

title: Samsung 980 NVMe SSD 1TB
description: A fast NVMe SSD that delivers quick boot and loading times.

title: ASUS B550-A Motherboard
description: A durable motherboard with PCIe 4.0 support for AMD Ryzen builds.

title: Logitech G502 Hero
description: A high-precision gaming mouse with adjustable DPI and weights.

title: Razer BlackWidow V3
description: A mechanical gaming keyboard with tactile switches and RGB lighting.

title: Sony WH-1000XM4
description: Noise-cancelling wireless headphones with premium sound quality.

title: Redragon Gaming Mousepad XXL
description: An extra-large anti-slip gaming mousepad.

title: Baseus USB-C Hub 7-in-1
description: A compact docking hub with HDMI, USB 3.0, and card reader support.
